member.name: M:Baracuda.Debug.ExtractStackTraceNoAlloc(System.Byte*,System.Int32,System.String)

summary.para: Populate an unmanaged buffer with the current managed call stack as a sequence of UTF-8 bytes, without allocating GC memory. Returns the number of bytes written into the buffer.

member.param: Target buffer to receive the callstack text
Max number of bytes to write
Project folder path, to clean up path names

summary.para: Clears errors from the developer console.
Reports whether the development console is visible. The development console cannot be made to appear using:
In the Build Settings dialog there is a check box called "Development Build".

member.name: M:Baracuda.Debug.DrawLine(UnityEngine.Vector3,UnityEngine.Vector3,UnityEngine.Color,System.Single)

summary.para: Draws a line between specified start and end points.

member.param: Point in world space where the line should start.
Point in world space where the line should end.
Color of the line.
How long the line should be visible for.

member.name: M:Baracuda.Debug.DrawLine(UnityEngine.Vector3,UnityEngine.Vector3,UnityEngine.Color)

summary.para: Draws a line between specified start and end points.

member.param: Point in world space where the line should start.
Point in world space where the line should end.

member.name: M:Baracuda.Debug.DrawLine(UnityEngine.Vector3,UnityEngine.Vector3)

summary.para: Draws a line between specified start and end points.

Point in world space where the line should end.

member.name: M:Baracuda.Debug.DrawLine(UnityEngine.Vector3,UnityEngine.Vector3,UnityEngine.Color,System.Single,System.Boolean)

summary.para: Draws a line between specified start and end points.

member.param: Point in world space where the line should start.
Point in world space where the line should end.
Color of the line.
How long the line should be visible for.
Should the line be obscured by objects closer to the camera?

member.name: M:Baracuda.Debug.DrawRay(UnityEngine.Vector3,UnityEngine.Vector3,UnityEngine.Color,System.Single)

summary.para: Draws a line from start to start + dir in world coordinates.

member.param: Point in world space where the ray should start.
Direction and length of the ray.
Color of the drawn line.
How long the line will be visible for (in seconds).

member.name: M:Baracuda.Debug.DrawRay(UnityEngine.Vector3,UnityEngine.Vector3,UnityEngine.Color)

summary.para: Draws a line from start to start + dir in world coordinates.

Direction and length of the ray.

member.name: M:Baracuda.Debug.DrawRay(UnityEngine.Vector3,UnityEngine.Vector3)

summary.para: Draws a line from start to start + dir in world coordinates.

member.name: M:Baracuda.Debug.DrawRay(UnityEngine.Vector3,UnityEngine.Vector3,UnityEngine.Color,System.Single,System.Boolean)

summary.para: Draws a line from start to start + dir in world coordinates.

Direction and length of the ray.

member.name: M:Baracuda.Debug.IsLogCategoryBlocked(Baracuda.LogCategory,UnityEngine.LogType)
member.summary: When true, logType messages of the specified category are suppressed during runtime.

member.name: M:Baracuda.Debug.DisableLogCategory(Baracuda.LogCategory,UnityEngine.LogType)
member.summary: Block a , preventing logs from being processed during runtime.

member.name: M:Baracuda.Debug.EnableLogCategory(Baracuda.LogCategory,UnityEngine.LogType)
member.summary: Unblock a , preventing logs from being processed during runtime.

member.summary: Combines two strings with minimal allocation.

member.name: T:Baracuda.DebugExtensions
member.summary: Contains some extension methods for debugging.

member.name: T:Baracuda.LogCategory
member.summary: Custom category for debug logs. Categories can be blocked during runtime. Predefined LogCategories can be blocked at compile time.

member.name: F:Baracuda.LogCategory.Account
member.summary: Log refers to platform dependent user account

member.name: M:Baracuda.LogCategory.ToString
member.summary: Returns the pure name of the category.

member.summary: Implicit conversion from a string to a LogCategory.

member.name: M:Baracuda.LogCategory.op_Implicit(Baracuda.LogCategory)~System.String
member.summary: Implicit conversion from a LogCategory to a string.

member.name: M:Baracuda.LogCategory.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Indicates whether this instance and a specified object are equal.
member.param: The object to compare with the current instance.
member.returns: if and this instance are the same type and represent the same value; otherwise, .

member.name: M:Baracuda.LogCategory.Equals(Baracuda.LogCategory)
member.summary: Indicates whether this instance and a specified LogCategory are equal.

member.name: M:Baracuda.LogCategory.Equals(Baracuda.LogCategory,Baracuda.LogCategory)
member.summary: Indicates whether two instances are equal.

member.name: M:Baracuda.LogCategory.CompareTo(Baracuda.LogCategory)
member.summary: Compares the current instance with another object of the same type and returns an integer that indicates whether the current instance precedes, follows, or occurs in the same position in the sort order as the other object.
member.param: An object to compare with this instance.
member.returns: A value that indicates the relative order of the objects being compared. The return value has these meanings: Value Meaning Less than zero This instance precedes in the sort order. Zero This instance occurs in the same position in the sort order as . Greater than zero This instance follows in the sort order.

member.name: M:Baracuda.LogCategory.GetHashCode(Baracuda.LogCategory)
member.summary: Returns the hash code the passed instance.

member.name: M:Baracuda.LogCategory.GetHashCode
member.summary: Returns the hash code for this instance.

member.summary: Indicates whether two LogCategories are equal.

member.name: M:Baracuda.LogCategory.op_Inequality(Baracuda.LogCategory,Baracuda.LogCategory)
member.summary: Indicates whether two LogCategories are not equal.

member.name: T:Baracuda.LogData`1
member.summary: Contains data of a Debug.Log call.

member.name: F:Baracuda.LogFiltering.ExplicitBlocking
member.summary: Every category is enabled until it is explicitly disabled.

member.name: F:Baracuda.LogFiltering.BlockedByDefault
member.summary: Every category is disabled until it is explicitly enabled.
